00019 {

00025 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 MessageId::MessageId
00027     (
00028     const MessageId & aRightSide
00029     )
00030 {
00031     mIdSize = aRightSide.mIdSize;
00032     memcpy( mId, aRightSide.mId, mIdSize );
00033 }

00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 MessageId::MessageId
00043     (
00044     const uint8   aIdSize,
00045     const uint8 * aId
00046     )
00047 {
00048     mIdSize = minval( aIdSize, sizeof( mId ) );
00049     memcpy( mId, aId, mIdSize );
00050 }

00052 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 MessageId::MessageId
00061     (
00062     const CString & aCString,
00063     codepage_type   aCodePage
00064     )
00065 {
00066     char  messageIdHex[35];
00067     //assume in hex
00068     WideCharToMultiByte( aCodePage, 0, aCString, -1, messageIdHex, 34, NULL, NULL );
00069 
00070     //check for '0x' in the message ID
00071     if( strncmp( messageIdHex, "0x", 2 ) == 0 )
00072     {
00073         mIdSize = (uint8)UTIL_hex_to_uint8( messageIdHex + 2, mId, 16 );
00074     }
00075     else
00076     {
00077         mIdSize = (uint8)minval( 16, strlen( messageIdHex ) );
00078         memmove( mId, messageIdHex, mIdSize );
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 bool MessageId::operator<
00090     (
00091     const MessageId & aRightSide
00092     ) const
00093 {
00094     if( mIdSize != aRightSide.mIdSize )
00095         return mIdSize < aRightSide.mIdSize;
00096     else
00097         return memcmp( mId, aRightSide.mId, mIdSize ) < 0;
00098 }
00099 
00100 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 const MessageId& MessageId::operator=
00105     (
00106     const MessageId & aRightSide
00107     )
00108 {
00109     if( this != &aRightSide )
00110     {
00111         mIdSize = aRightSide.mIdSize;
00112         memset( mId, 0, sizeof( mId ) );
00113         memcpy( mId, aRightSide.mId, minval( mIdSize, sizeof( mId ) ) );
00114     }
00115     return *this;
00116 }
00117 
00118 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 bool MessageId::operator==
00126     (
00127     const MessageId& aRightSide
00128     ) const
00129 {
00130     if( this->mIdSize != aRightSide.mIdSize )
00131         return false;
00132 
00133     if( 0 != memcmp( mId, aRightSide.mId, mIdSize ) )
00134         return false;
00135 
00136     return true;
00137 }

00146     return mId;
00147 }
00148 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00152 uint8 MessageId::getIdSize() const
00153 {
00154     return mIdSize;

00157 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 CString MessageId::toCString
00167     (
00168     codepage_type aCodePage
00169     ) const
00170 {
00171     TCHAR  messageIdWide[35];
00172     char   messageId[35];
00173     CString formattedId;
00174 
00175     memset( messageId, 0, 35 );
00176     if( UTIL_data_is_printable( (const char *)mId, mIdSize ) )
00177     {
00178         strncpy( messageId, (const char *)mId, mIdSize );
00179     }
00180     else
00181     {
00182         strcpy( messageId, "0x" );
00183         UTIL_uint8_to_hex( mId, &messageId[2], mIdSize );
00184     }
00185     MultiByteToWideChar( aCodePage, 0, messageId, -1, messageIdWide, 35 );
00186     messageIdWide[34] = '\0';
00187     formattedId.Format( _T(" %s"), messageIdWide );
00188 
00189     return formattedId;
00190 }
